poison.name: Acid
poison.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target's Special Defense is lowered by 1.

poison.name: Acid Armor
poison.effect: Sharply raises the user's Defense by 2.

poison.name: Acid Downpour
poison.effect: Z-Move. Base power and category depend on the original move.

poison.name: Acid Spray
poison.effect: Sharply lowers the target's Special Defense by 2.

poison.name: Baneful Bunker
poison.effect: Priority. Protects the user from all attacks. If a contact move is blocked, the attacker is Poisoned.

poison.name: Belch
poison.effect: The user must have eaten a Berry to use this move.

poison.name: Clear Smog
poison.effect: Resets all of the target's stat changes.

poison.name: Coil
poison.effect: Raises the user's Strength, Defense, and Accuracy by 1.

poison.name: Corrosive Gas
poison.effect: Destroys the held items of all adjacent Pokémon.

poison.name: Cross Poison
poison.effect: High Critical Hit Ratio. Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target is Poisoned.

poison.name: Filthy Terrain
poison.effect: Custom Move. Creates a Filthy Terrain for 5 rounds. Pokémon on the ground are immune to Poison and their Poison-type moves are powered up.

poison.name: Gastro Acid
poison.effect: Suppresses the target's Ability for the rest of the battle.

poison.name: Gunk Shot
poison.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target is Poisoned. Low Accuracy.

poison.name: Mortal Spin
poison.effect: Poisons all adjacent opponents. Removes hazards and trapping effects from the user's side of the field.

poison.name: Poison Fang
poison.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target is Badly Poisoned.

poison.name: Poison Gas
poison.effect: Poisons all adjacent opponents.

poison.name: Poison Jab
poison.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target is Poisoned.

poison.name: Poison Powder
poison.effect: The target is Poisoned. Low Accuracy.

poison.name: Poison Sting
poison.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target is Poisoned.

poison.name: Poison Tail
poison.effect: High Critical Hit Ratio. Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target is Poisoned.

poison.name: Purify
poison.effect: Cures an ally's status ailment and restores some of the user's HP.

poison.name: Shell Side Arm
poison.effect: Compares the user's Strength vs. Special and the target's Defense vs. Special Defense to determine the most effective damage category (physical or special).

poison.name: Sludge
poison.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target is Poisoned.

poison.name: Sludge Bomb
poison.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target is Poisoned.

poison.name: Sludge Wave
poison.effect: Hits all adjacent Pokémon. Roll 1d6. On a 6, targets are Poisoned.

poison.name: Smog
poison.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target is Poisoned.

poison.name: Toxic
poison.effect: The target is Badly Poisoned.

poison.name: Toxic Spikes
poison.effect: Sets a hazard on the opponent's side of the field. Pokémon entering the field are Poisoned. Using it twice makes them Badly Poisoned.

poison.name: Toxic Thread
poison.effect: Lowers the target's Dexterity by 1 and Poisons it.

poison.name: Venom Drench
poison.effect: Lowers the Strength, Special, and Dexterity of all Poisoned opponents by 1.

poison.name: Venoshock
poison.effect: If the target is Poisoned, this move's damage is doubled.

psychic.name: Agility
psychic.effect: Sharply raises the user's Dexterity by 2.

psychic.name: Ally Switch
psychic.effect: Priority. The user swaps places with an ally on the field.

psychic.name: Amnesia
psychic.effect: Sharply raises the user's Special Defense by 2.

psychic.name: Barrier
psychic.effect: Sharply raises the user's Defense by 2.

psychic.name: Calm Mind
psychic.effect: Raises the user's Special and Special Defense by 1.

psychic.name: Confusion
psychic.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target is Confused.

psychic.name: Cosmic Power
psychic.effect: Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1.

psychic.name: Dream Eater
psychic.effect: The user recovers HP equal to half the damage dealt. Only works on sleeping targets.

psychic.name: Eerie Spell
psychic.effect: Reduces the PP of the target's last used move by 3.

psychic.name: Esper Wing
psychic.effect: High Priority. High Critical Hit Ratio.

psychic.name: Expanding Force
psychic.effect: If used on Psychic Terrain, this move hits all adjacent opponents and its damage is boosted by 1.5x.

psychic.name: Extrasensory
psychic.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target Flinches.

psychic.name: Free-zy Frost
psychic.effect: Resets all of the target's stat changes.

psychic.name: Future Sight
psychic.effect: An attack that will strike the target two turns later.

psychic.name: Genesis Supernova
psychic.effect: Z-Move. Sets up Psychic Terrain.

psychic.name: Glitzy Glow
psychic.effect: Sets up Light Screen on the user's side of the field.

psychic.name: Gravity
psychic.effect: For 5 rounds, all Pokémon are grounded and cannot use flying or levitating moves. Evasion is lowered.

psychic.name: Guard Split
psychic.effect: The user and the target average their Defense and Special Defense stats.

psychic.name: Guard Swap
psychic.effect: The user and the target swap their Defense and Special Defense stats.

psychic.name: Heal Block
psychic.effect: For 5 rounds, the target cannot recover HP.

psychic.name: Heal Pulse
psychic.effect: Heals the target for up to half of its max HP.

psychic.name: Healing Wish
psychic.effect: The user faints. The next Pokémon sent out is fully healed and cured of status ailments.

psychic.name: Heart Stamp
psychic.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target Flinches.

psychic.name: Heart Swap
psychic.effect: The user and the target swap all of their stat changes.

psychic.name: Hypnosis
psychic.effect: Puts the target to sleep. Low Accuracy.

psychic.name: Imprison
psychic.effect: The user prevents opponents from using any moves that the user also knows.

psychic.name: Instruct
psychic.effect: Priority. The target immediately uses its last used move again.

psychic.name: Kinesis
psychic.effect: Lowers the target's Accuracy by 1.

psychic.name: Light Screen
psychic.effect: For 5 rounds, special damage against the user's team is halved.

psychic.name: Lumina Crash
psychic.effect: Sharply lowers the target's Special Defense by 2.

psychic.name: Lunar Blessing
psychic.effect: The user and its allies recover 1/4 of their max HP and are cured of status ailments.

psychic.name: Lunar Dance
psychic.effect: The user faints. The next Pokémon sent out is fully healed, cured of status ailments, and has all its PP restored.

psychic.name: Magic Coat
psychic.effect: Priority. Reflects status moves back at the user.

psychic.name: Magic Powder
psychic.effect: Changes the target's type to Psychic.

psychic.name: Magic Room
psychic.effect: For 5 rounds, all held items are suppressed.

psychic.name: Miracle Eye
psychic.effect: Dark-type immunities to Psychic moves are ignored. Evasion boosts are ignored.

psychic.name: Mirror Coat
psychic.effect: Priority (goes last). If hit by a special attack, the user deals double the damage taken.

psychic.name: Photon Geyser
psychic.effect: Compares the user's Strength and Special stats, and deals damage based on the higher stat.

psychic.name: Power Split
psychic.effect: The user and the target average their Strength and Special stats.

psychic.name: Power Swap
psychic.effect: The user and the target swap their Strength and Special stat changes.

psychic.name: Power Trick
psychic.effect: The user swaps its Strength and Defense stats.

psychic.name: Prismatic Laser
psychic.effect: The user must recharge on the next turn.

psychic.name: Psybeam
psychic.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target is Confused.

psychic.name: Psychic
psychic.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target's Special Defense is lowered by 1.

psychic.name: Psychic Fangs
psychic.effect: Destroys Reflect and Light Screen.

psychic.name: Psychic Terrain
psychic.effect: Creates a Psychic Terrain for 5 rounds. Pokémon on the ground are protected from priority moves and their Psychic-type moves are powered up.

psychic.name: Psycho Boost
psychic.effect: Sharply lowers the user's Special by 2 after use.

psychic.name: Psycho Cut
psychic.effect: High Critical Hit Ratio.

psychic.name: Psycho Shift
psychic.effect: The user transfers its status ailment to the target.

psychic.name: Psyshield Bash
psychic.effect: Raises the user's Defense by 1.

psychic.name: Psyshock
psychic.effect: This move deals physical damage, using the user's Special stat and the target's Defense stat.

psychic.name: Psywave
psychic.effect: Deals damage equal to a random number between 0.5 and 1.5 times the user's level.

psychic.name: Reflect
psychic.effect: For 5 rounds, physical damage against the user's team is halved.

psychic.name: Rest
psychic.effect: The user falls asleep for two turns, but fully recovers HP and is cured of all status ailments.

psychic.name: Role Play
psychic.effect: The user copies the target's Ability.

psychic.name: Skill Swap
psychic.effect: The user and the target swap Abilities.

psychic.name: Speed Swap
psychic.effect: The user and the target swap their Dexterity stats.

psychic.name: Stored Power
psychic.effect: This move's damage increases by +1 for each of the user's stat boosts.

psychic.name: Synchronoise
psychic.effect: This move only affects targets that share a type with the user.

psychic.name: Telekinesis
psychic.effect: For 3 rounds, the target is levitated and all moves against it are guaranteed to hit.

psychic.name: Teleport
psychic.effect: The user switches out. In the wild, it allows escape from battle.

psychic.name: Trick
psychic.effect: The user and the target swap held items.

psychic.name: Trick Room
psychic.effect: For 5 rounds, slower Pokémon move first.

psychic.name: Twin Beam
psychic.effect: This move hits twice.

psychic.name: Wonder Room
psychic.effect: For 5 rounds, all Pokémon's Defense and Special Defense stats are swapped.

psychic.name: Zen Headbutt
psychic.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target Flinches.

rock.name: Accelrock
rock.effect: Priority.

rock.name: Ancient Power
rock.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, all of the user's stats are raised by 1.

rock.name: Continental Crush
rock.effect: Z-Move. Base power and category depend on the original move.

rock.name: Diamond Storm
rock.effect: Hits all adjacent opponents. Roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the user's Defense is sharply raised by 2.

rock.name: Head Smash
rock.effect: The user takes recoil damage equal to half the damage dealt.

rock.name: Meteor Beam
rock.effect: The user charges for one turn, raising its Special by 1, then attacks.

rock.name: Mighty Cleave
rock.effect: This move hits even if the target is using Protect or Detect.

rock.name: Power Gem
rock.effect: None.

rock.name: Rock Blast
rock.effect: This move hits 2 to 5 times.

rock.name: Rock Polish
rock.effect: Sharply raises the user's Dexterity by 2.

rock.name: Rock Slide
rock.effect: Hits all adjacent opponents. Roll 1d6. On a 6, targets Flinch.

rock.name: Rock Throw
rock.effect: None.

rock.name: Rock Tomb
rock.effect: Lowers the target's Dexterity by 1.

rock.name: Rock Wrecker
rock.effect: The user must recharge on the next turn.

rock.name: Rollout
rock.effect: This move's damage doubles each consecutive hit, up to 5 hits.

rock.name: Salt Cure
rock.effect: The target takes 1/8 of its max HP in damage at the end of each round. Damage is doubled if the target is Water or Steel type.

rock.name: Sandstorm
rock.effect: Creates a Sandstorm for 5 rounds.

rock.name: Smack Down
rock.effect: Grounds the target, making it vulnerable to Ground-type moves.

rock.name: Splintered Stormshards
rock.effect: Z-Move. Destroys any active Terrain.

rock.name: Stealth Rock
rock.effect: Sets a hazard on the opponent's side of the field. Pokémon entering the field take damage based on their weakness to Rock.

rock.name: Stone Axe
rock.effect: High Critical Hit Ratio. Sets up Stealth Rock on the opponent's side of the field.

rock.name: Stone Edge
rock.effect: High Critical Hit Ratio. Low Accuracy.

rock.name: Tar Shot
rock.effect: Lowers the target's Dexterity by 1 and makes it weak to Fire-type moves.

rock.name: Wide Guard
rock.effect: Priority. Protects the user and its allies from moves that hit multiple targets for one turn.
